Asset.Name: Test Battle
Asset.Description: It's time to test your mettle in combat! Find Sir Shire and let's see what you're capable of!
Asset.ObjectiveMessage: Walk south to the bottom of the map. There you will find Sir Shire awaiting you for combat!
Asset.CompletionMessage: Congratulations! You have defeated Sir Shire. You may be the one to save us from the evil Tamar...
Asset.DestinationObjectiveMessage: Go and speak with Shed-darr the Wise.
